「五本书」第三辑：文明的回望

June 19, 2021

Considerate la vostra semenza:
fatti non foste a viver come bruti,
ma per seguir virtute e canoscenza.

[Consider ye the seed from which ye sprang:
Ye were not made to live like unto brutes,
But for pursuit of virtue and of knowledge.]

—Inferno : XXVI.118–120

#跳至书单   #跳至书评

本辑书单

  • 点击原文或译文标题开始阅读（链接至网络公共图书馆 Wikisource, HathiTrust, Internet Archive, & Online Library of Liberty）
  • 点击封面进入书评


Esquisse d’un tableau historique des progrès de l’esprit humain

 Nicolas de Condorcet

初版  1795    Henri Agasse
英译  Outlines of an Historical View of the Progress of the Human Mind  (1795);  Sketch for a Historical Picture of the Progress of the Human Mind  (trans. June Barraclough, 1955)


Histoire générale de la civilisation en Europe depuis la chute de l’Empire romain jusqu’à la Révolution française

 François Guizot

初版  1828    Pichon & Didier
英译  Lectures on European Civilization  (trans. Priscilla Maria Beckwith, 1837);  General History of Civilization in Europe: From the Fall of the Roman Empire to the French Revolution  (1838)


Science and the Modern World

 Alfred North Whitehead

初版  1925    Cambridge University Press     Macmillan


Civilisation: A Personal View

 Kenneth Clark

初版  1969    BBC & John Murray    Harper & Row
导读  A Guide to Civilisation  (National Gallery of Art, 1970)


From Dawn to Decadence: 500 Years of Western Cultural Life, 1500 to the Present

 Jacques Barzun

初版  2000    HarperCollins
